title: Video-Based Lesson Module Design for Strengthening Pre-Service Secondary Mathematics Teachers’ Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Providing pre-service teachers with an online learning environment to analyze middle/high school students’ cognitive processes and develop effective teaching strategies

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design at least three customized feedback strategies by analyzing students' error types.
Video materials can be used to diagnose student engagement issues during class and suggest improvement strategies
Classroom management skills can be applied with over 80% accuracy through student role-playing in simulation/VR environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
